        DESCRIPTION:
Due to difficult, but exciting gameplay. 
In DiRT 3 shows more cars, territories, routes and events than in previous games. More than five dozen of the best rally cars, racing over the past fifty years, twice as many tracks as the project in 2009, the competition for every taste, ratings, awards and achievements - in DiRT 3 each can become a true professional virtual rally and make a brilliant career racer.

        GAME FEATURES:
" The huge car park. The game features the famous rally cars the last few decades of the twentieth century, which will impress any fan of racing. 
" Virtuosos of the steering wheel. The new regime "Dzhimhana" will allow everyone to show their skills in specially equipped areas, performing all sorts of giddy avtotryuki - Drift , ski jumping, "police reversals." 
" And in the rain and snow. Racers can test yourself by taking part in competitions in difficult weather conditions, as well as at night. 
" Around the World. Competitors will have to overcome many difficult trails rally championship, located in Europe, Africa, the United States . " Split Screen. In its first-ever series, players can compete in split screen mode. " At the public. For those who want a world-wide fame, the possibility to record videos with the most successful and spectacular races and publish them on YouTube, without leaving the game.
